amendment.description: To modify and improve the National Call to Service program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2495 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2495 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Dodd. (consideration: CR S12589-12595; text: CR S12593) To modify and improve the National Call to Service program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2495 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
